name: Grab TV show and share it
description: The semester project LinkedTV in Eurecom

html.video-controller: The html file plays as the controller role
html.video-client: The html file plays as the client role

servers.server-controller: Transfer timestamps from controller to all clients
servers.server-html: Rendering the controller html file and client html file
